Room.Name: Bendine Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Bendine Way, west of Steve's Tackle Shop.
Room.LongDescription: Steve's Fishing and Tackle Shop provides an assortment of fishing gear needed to land a large bass or even a shark. He also provides boat and gear rentals for those who dare to go out on the open seas. The Rhinestone Marina is located to the west, where a number of small boats are moored.
